nodes.text: Eastgate was one of the largest commercial and warehouse districts of in the Upper City of the planet Taris. In 3964 BBY, local hood Marn Hierogryph had a warehouse in Eastgate filled with landspeeder engines that he claimed were "right off the line." Like most of Taris, Eastgate was devastated by the Sith Lord Darth Malak in 3956 BBY.

Eastgate was first mentioned in Knights of the Old Republic 1, a comic book written by John Jackson Miller and released in 2006. In 2008, Eastgate was given an entry in The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia.
